doc.title: Beteta, episodio 3.1 - En busca del video perdido
doc.plot: Francisco Tassarella, a young man in his twenties, wants to date Sofia, but she hates him. Sofia discovers that Francisco has access to a tape that contains the secrets of Beteta, master of all men. He does not know the importance of that tape. Vicente, the last survivor of Beteta's pupils, must help Francisco in the almost impossible mission of keeping the tape out of Sofia's hands, who turns out to be the boss of the "Féminas Floras", a radical feminist group that wants the secrets of Beteta in order to slave all men.
